title: Charles Young Buffalo Soldiers National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        U.S. Route 42 Temporary Road Closure  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, U.S. Route 42 Temporary Road Closure  Beginning Monday, August 1, U.S. 42 will be closed for approximately 12 days, reopening Friday, August 12.  Replacement of culverts on U.S. 42 just west of the park require a full closure.  No access to the park from EASTBOUND U.S. 42. more
